languages.text: {n}Арджента морщится от вашего окрика и немного, на пару сантиметров, опускает оружие — однако не убирает его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Констанза морщится от вашего окрика и немного, на пару сантиметров, опускает болтер — однако не убирает его.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента морщится от вашего окрика и немного, на пару сантиметров, опускает оружие — однако не убирает его.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到你的命令之后，阿洁塔皱着鼻子，把武器压低了几厘米，但她并没有把武器收起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的命令之后，阿洁塔皱着鼻子，把武器压低了几厘米，但她并没有把武器收起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta arruga la nariz ante tu orden y baja el arma unos centímetros... pero no la suelta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta arruga la nariz ante tu orden y baja el arma unos centímetros... pero no la suelta.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはあなたの命令に鼻にしわを寄せ、武器を数センチ下げる…だが、彼女はそれを手放しはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはあなたの命令に鼻にしわを寄せ、武器を数センチ下げる…だが、彼女はそれを手放しはしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta rümpft angesichts deines gebrüllten Befehls die Nase und lässt ihre Waffe einige Zentimeter sinken ... macht aber keine Anstalten, sie wegzustecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta rümpft angesichts deines gebrüllten Befehls die Nase und lässt ihre Waffe einige Zentimeter sinken ... macht aber keine Anstalten, sie wegzustecken.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Votre intervention arrache une grimace à Argenta, qui abaisse son arme de quelques centimètres sans la ranger pour autant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre intervention arrache une grimace à Argenta, qui abaisse son arme de quelques centimètres sans la ranger pour autant.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, bağırarak verdiğin emirden sonra burnunu büküp silahını birkaç santimetre alçaltıyor ama tamamen de kaldırmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wrinkles her nose at your shouted command and lowers the weapon by a few centimetres — but she does not put it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta bağırdığın emirden sonra burnunu büküyor ve silahını birkaç santimetre alçaltıyor ama tamamen kaldırmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
